info.name: LearingSphere API Testing
info.description: API test collection for LearingSphere - The Aura of Growth, Unlock Future with Free Learning

request.description: Register a new user
Login a registered user
Verify user email with token (replace :token with valid token)
Send password reset email
Reset user password with token (replace :token with valid token)
Refresh JWT token
Logout user (server-side token invalidation)
Get all users (admin only)
Get user by ID (replace :id with valid user ID)
Create a new user (admin only)
Update user profile (replace :id with valid user ID)
Delete user (admin only, replace :id with valid user ID)
Switch user mode to tutor/learner
Search users by query, role, and location
Schedule a new session (tutor only)
Get all sessions for the authenticated user
Get session by ID (replace :id with valid session ID)
Update session (tutor only, replace :id with valid session ID)
Cancel/delete session (tutor only, replace :id with valid session ID)
Join a session (replace :id with valid session ID)
Upload session recording (replace :id with valid session ID)
Generate matches for a learner
Get matches for a user (replace :userId with valid user ID)
Accept a match (replace :matchId with valid match ID)
Reject a match (replace :matchId with valid match ID)
Delete a match (replace :matchId with valid match ID)
Get top match recommendations
Create progress for a new user
Update user progress
Get progress for a user (replace :userId with valid user ID)
Get top users leaderboard
Manually update progress (admin only, replace :progressId with valid ID)
Delete progress (admin only, replace :progressId with valid ID)
Submit a review for a session
Get reviews for a user (replace :userId with valid user ID)
Get reviews for a session (replace :sessionId with valid session ID)
Update a review (replace :reviewId with valid review ID)
Delete a review (replace :reviewId with valid review ID)
Get all users (admin only)
Ban or unban a user (admin only, replace :userId with valid user ID)
Change user role (admin only, replace :userId with valid user ID)
Moderate a session (approve/delete, replace :sessionId with valid session ID)
Get admin analytics
Delete a review (admin only, replace :reviewId with valid review ID)
